metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22132 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Elasticsearch versions 7.7.0 to 7.10.1 contain an information disclosureflaw in the async search API. Users who execute an async search willimproperly store the HTTP headers. An Elasticsearch user with the abilityto read the .tasks index could obtain sensitive request headers of otherusers in the cluster. This issue is fixed in Elasticsearch 7.10.2

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
